tool-help-config.toolDescription: Utility to extract xml attributes or elements label and converting to property keys.

param.description: The input path to XML, if a directory all files will be handled recursively.
The output path where to produce the XML, if input is a directory, output MUST be too.
param.info: The xml file indent can be different from input.

param.description: The output xml properties containing the processed labels.
param.info: The order of the properties will not be random, but the same as they are found during processing.

param.description: If set to `true`, the 'info' columns of tool parameters will be ignored.
param.info: By default will check on file system. To check path on class loader, prefix with 'cl://'

param.description: A extension filter, if inputXml is directory, only files matching the extension will be processed.
param.info: Directories will be recursed regardless of this param value.

param.description: if set, the rule catalog in convert-config will be used instead of the default one.
param.info: If not set, the 'use-catalog' attribute of root xml element will be checked.
